text: Aey eman walo! Boht badgumaaniyon say bacho yaqeen mano kay baaz badgumaniyan gunah hain, aur bhed na tatola kero aur na tum mein say koi kissi ki gheebat keray. Kiya tum mein say koi bhi apnay murdah bhai ka gosht khana pasand kerta ha? Tum ko iss say ghinn aayegi, aur Allah say dartay raho, be-shak Allah toba qabool kernay wala meharbaan hai
